iep_goals: Improve reading fluency to 120 words per minute with 95% accuracy
Answer comprehension questions from grade-level texts with 80% accuracy
accommodations: Use of highlighter for key ideas
learning_styles: benefits from repetition and guided practice
prefers visual aids and highlighted texts

interviews.parent: Parent reports Ava enjoys reading graphic novels but avoids chapter books.
interviews.teacher: Ava participates in reading group but needs decoding support.

observations.psychologist: Below grade-level decoding skills; strong comprehension when listening to material.
